snippet: The latest draft report by United Nations climate experts cites technologies that are still in their infancy, with few projects operating around the world.
abstract: Some technologies cited in draft report by United Nations climate experts face significant obstacles before they can be widely put in effect to limit impact of climate change.
lead_paragraph: The latest draft report by United Nations climate experts cites technologies that are still in their infancy, with few projects operating around the world.

headline.main: Climate Aids in Study Face Big Obstacles
headline.print_headline: Climate Aids in Study Face Big Obstacles
